Text:
Just curious, I noticed that you always put "Retail" in your headers. What exactly does that mean? Are these CD rips? Are you the ripper? And finally, who is Happy Hacker Industries?

Peace :)

Retail means that the cd is a retail copy. As in, purchased in the store. It's not a demo copy or pre-release for radio stations. I am one of the rippers. HHI is Happy Hacker Industries; an audio/video ripping group. Scene quality but without the scene l33t ego crap. :)
retail=retail cdrip. As in store bought, not demo/cd-r.
